body.name: virtavo Security Cameras Wireless Outdoor, Battery Powered Starlight Color Night Vision Weatherproof, Surveillance WiFi Home Camera Outside, AI Motion Detection, Compatible with Alexa
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 37 mins
features: 【High Definition Video Quality】 The security camera offers a resolution of 1080P Full HD, ensuring that every detail is captured clearly and accurately. With starlight color night vision, you'll be able to see motions clearly even in low-light conditions (within 30ft). It is recommended to set the Black&white night vision mode in dark.

【Easy to Install and Use】 With the 100% wire-free design, the installation only takes several minutes to finish. With a long battery life, you don't need to worry about charging often. According to our laboratory test data, the battery can be used for 1-3 months if the camera has been triggered 30 times a day. ( The battery life depends on the camera function usage and environment. The more ofter the camera is woken up to work, the faster the battery will be used up. )

【PIR Motion Detection & Real-Time Notifications】 With advanced PIR detection and Al smart algorithms, you can get instant notifications once suspicious motion is detected, and take action before anything bad happens. You can also set human, pet, or vehicle detection within the APP so that the camera intelligently helps reduce unnecessary motions and focus on the most important activities.

【2-way Talk & Device Sharing & Alexa】 With the built-in microphone and speaker, you can listen and talk to anyone through the app anytime remotely, or use Alexa to voice control the camera. Such as: communicate with the delivery man, warn burglars, or talk to your family and friends through the app. Share the device with up to 5 users simultaneously so that all the members can view the videos and protect together.

【Secure Recording Storage】When motion is triggered, videos will be recorded to the SD card or our Cloud. You can track important footage anytime remotely. Micro SD card is not included in the package, storage up to 256GB. Cloud service is super affordable and encrypted, only you can access private information even when the camera is stolen. We offer a 30-day cloud trial, start and cancel anytime.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 3,646 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Powerful Starlight Color Night Vision Virtavo cameras support powerful Starlight Color/ Infrared Night Vision. Whether in low light conditions or complete darkness, human faces or license plate within 30 feet can be clearly captured, giving you the best night vision experience without missing any important details.

Keep an Eye Inside and Outside Want to check on your kids or elder parents while you are working? Worried about burglars breaking into the house or stealing packages? Want to receive warehouse fire & intrusion motion alerts immediately? With the VIRTAVO security system, you can control all aspects of your home and business seamlessly and effortlessly through a single APP.

PIR Motion Detection & Siren Alarm VIRTAVO camera detects motions precisely due to its powerful PIR sensor. When suspicious people try to commit a crime, our camera will act quickly to ensure your property's safety. Turn the siren alarm to ward off burglars when necessary. Custom Detection Area Set several activity zones to reduce false alarm and receive alerts only in specific areas. You can set the front door, bedroom, swimming pool and other places that are privacy and needed protection. 106° Wider Viewing Angle VIRTAVO Camera provides ultra-wide 106° horizontal and 57° vertical view that covers more target areas. Night vision up to 30ft.

Multiple Devices Sharing Share the camera access to your family in a secure and controllable way. You can add up to 5 users, and cancel sharing at anytime. Protect with people you trust. Schedule Personal Alarm Set a specific alarm to fit your own schedule, reduce unwanted motion alerts and save battery life. Let the camera do the rest for you. Easy Installation and Setup 100% wire-free and weather-resistant design, no cord needed, you can easily place the camera anywhere within 10 minutes. Setup requires a 2.4GHz WiFi, we have a full in-app guide for you.

Safe Local and Cloud Storage No matter if you want to rewind a cute moment about your pets or kids, or if you want to track important footage on a specific day, you can get a clear & detailed video clip anytime, anywhere with an affordable cloud subscription. For your convenience, you can also save all event recordings on a micro SD card (up to 256GB). All the data storage and your information are encrypted.

Note 1. Mount the camera vertically upward to avoid rain/snow getting in the device. 2. Mount the camera not higher than 16 feet from the ground (*alarm system won't be triggered above this height). 3. Camera only supports 2.4G WiFi during the setup process, please don’t use 5GHz WiFi connection. 4. Camera only works with Home V app. 5. Battery Life depends on the specific camera function usage and environment factors (detection mode, streaming mode, temperature, and internet connection, etc.)

Note 1. Mount the camera vertically upward to avoid rain/snow getting in the device. 2. Mount the camera not higher than 16 feet from the ground (*alarm system won't be triggered above this height). 3. Camera only supports 2.4G WiFi during the setup process, please don’t use 5GHz WiFi connection. 4. Camera only works with Home V app. 5. Battery Life depends on the specific camera function usage and environment factors (detection mode, streaming mode, temperature, and internet connection, etc.)

Technical Details Video 1080P HD, Color Night Vision Field of view 106° Horizontal, 57° Vertical, 8X Digital Zoom Alert /Trigger PIR Motion Deteciton Storage Options Micro SD Card (up to 256GB); 30-Day Free Cloud Trial Audio Two-Way Audio Battery Capacity 4400mAh Rechargeable Operating conditions -4°F~122°F Outdoor/Indoor，Waterproof Connectivity 2.4 GHz WiFi Sensor 1/2.8" BSI Progressive Scan CMOS Lens F1.6 Aperture, 3.0 mm Focal Length Battery Life 1- 3 months @ Standard Test Condition(1) Night Vision Starlight (color night vision) -illuminates up to 30 ft Mount Method Desktop/Ceiling/Wall Box includes VIRTAVO Camera, Mounting Base, Quick-Release Battery Pack, Installation Tools and Screws, USB Cable, USB Adapter, Quick Start Guide, Mount Sets, Screw Kit Item weight 0.4LB Item Dimensions 3.22 x1.52x 2.76"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had this camera for a few months now, and I’ve been completely happy with it. It is user friendly, has a long battery life, and takes excellent quality photos and videos. I like how it alerts me, and can distinguish between a pet or a person- I’m primarily monitoring my two feral cats. It has great features that perform well. It’s got great night-vision viewing, and Colors are vibrant and clear. The monthly monitoring is very reasonable, and I’ve gotten quick responses and thorough support whenever I’ve had questions or an issue. Very good customer service. Now that I’ve figured out about using it, I’d like to get 1 or 2 more cameras. It seems like it will be easy to monitor them all. I highly recommend these Virtavo cameras as an affordably-priced, high quality, worthwhile investment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well priced, feature rich, good quality
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to mount in the attic as we were hearing some noises and wanted to find out what type of critter we may be dealing with. Instructions were easy, set up was a breeze, app is very user friendly. We don’t have a power outlet in the attic, so hoping the battery lasts at least a week as described, but we just installed so I will update soon. The adhesive fell after one night, so should use screws if mounting off the ground. Two way audio works great, picture quality is amazing, WiFi connectivity is strong, even far from the router and tucked up in the attic. IR lights up pitch black like it’s daytime. Good buy for me, I’m going to buy more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for the price!
reviews.reviewText: This camera only cost $30, but let me tell you it is a great value. For starters, the set up is very convenient and say to understand. The cloud storage subscription is only $2.99 after the 30 day free trial. The best part is the quality of that dang camera and the range!! It looks like daylight at night and the range of the view is off the charts! This one is definitely with the buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good but not great
reviews.reviewText: Good: Battery life is decent they are rechargeable, and use a micro usb to charge indoors. Easy to settup , picture quality is pretty good in fair lighting, not so great in the dark. Sound is average. I have 4 of them, 2 on my front corners street side to watch driveway and road coming in as well as both angles to my door. One for backyard trailer and shed, and one inside .Bad: it seems no matter how i settup the parameters, it will still constantly go off if a car goes down road. I can set it far away from road and it will always pickup cars driving by and alert my phone/waste battery life by activating motion sense. It has two methods of memory for rewatching collected video. Sd card or a paid service . Youd obviously like to use a cheap sd csrd to capture footage, but for whatever reason does not save to it even after being formatted and settup per camera instructions. This is annoying because if somerhing does happen, i cannot go back currently to view the occurrence and basically am left with a $30 viewing lense through app. My dad also cannot save to his sd cards on his 4 cameras and constantly gets alerts to his phone for cars and neighborhood walkers who arent anywhere near threat/concern status. I may just pay for the service to save to cloud, but overall they are better than nothing and competitive priced. Its useful to watch your house while at work, or on vacation at various times to make sure all is good. They also have voice communication to the camera and from camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Hands down the best cameras I've bought on here. I went through several cameras. I didn't like most of them. There was either a long delay, or the battery didn't last very long and needed to be charged too frequently. These cameras are amazing. I am able to charge them once and leave them for a long time so far. The delay is less than a second, so I am able to see things near real-time. The night vision is incredible, in full color, and nice and bright. I love these cameras. The price is also VERY right! I highly recommend them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The pros: I like the price point and the battery life has been better than expected. The camera quality is good as well. The range is great. The sensor will trigger to the end of my driveway and even a bit into the road. We purchased to keep an eye on the front of the house and the driveway so great there. This was also very easy to install.The cons: There is a delay to pull up the feed. I have very good internet and have no issues getting feed right away from another camera brand in the backyard. I’m not sure if anyone else is having an issue with this or not.Overall for the price, and quality of footage on the video, I’m very happy with this camera, and will be purchasing others for the rest of my property as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wish it was 360 , but so clear , great distance , easy set up 2 options for mounting stick and screws , charge lasts a few days, easy set up , great price worth the money , I paid the 1.99 a month for iCloud to get the footage .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Camera works fine but app sucks. Update#2
reviews.reviewText: I've tried many cameras and this one beats all the others. My neighbor has the Ring camera and says my camera picture at night is way better. You can barely tell the difference from day to night. Notifications are great, cloud service is very affordable and works great. Best investment I've made in a long time. ***********UPDATE. After using this device for about a week it all of a sudden stopped connecting to the App. Everytime I try to connect to the camera it says weak wifi signal move camera closer to router. If the fastest speed Spectrum offers doesn't work, nothing will. #UPDATE#2 The issue connecting to the app I was using was fine. My issue I was having was caused by a faulty battery. The Seller replaced the faulty unit without any issues at all. Seller is a great asset to Amazon.
